title: Khloé Kardashian’s Favorite Amazon Items Include a Bidet and Resistance Bands
description: She shares all of her go-to products to shop on Prime.
excerpt: She shares all of her go-to products to shop on Prime.
text: I’m a shopping expert; I tell people which things are worth buying—it’s my job. But even professionals need advice sometimes, so for Amazon’s Prime Big Deal Days, which runs through today, October 9, I got some advice from none other than Khloé Kardashian. Below, she’s sharing all her favorite Amazon products to shop during the big sale. “I shop so many things on Amazon,” Kardashian told me via email. “My favorite thing is how wide its selection is. I love to browse through organizing products to see what’s new and looking for beauty products.”Shop Khloé’s Workout PicksZacro Resistance BandsNow 49% OffFlybird Weight BenchNow 31% OffWHATAFIT Exercise Bands with Door AnchorAmong her picks include a few pieces of gym equipment, in case you’ve set your sights on a revenge body of your own. Kardashian recommends a weight bench and two varieties of resistance bands to upgrade your home gym. “I love finding new workout equipment on Amazon,” says Kardashian. “I workout almost every day, and it’s important to change up my routine. With resistance bands, there are so many different exercises you can do and keep it exciting.”Her list also notably features a bidet attachment for toilets, an electric makeup brush cleaner, an affordable luggage set, and a tool that is said to work magic on hard-to-pick-up pet hair. Plus, shoppers with kids can shop from Kardashian’s personal recommendations for parents, including a baby monitor and bassinet. Shop Khloé’s Baby EssentialsHelloBaby Video Baby Monitor with Camera and Audio, Night VisionNow 20% OffYADAQE Baby Basinet Bedside Sleeper Now 21% OffYakry 2-Kids Baby Car Camera for Backseat “These are products that were important for me when my kids were younger,” she says. “I always got suggestions from my friends and did a lot of research.”“For Prime Big Deal Days especially, I’m excited to shop for things for upcoming birthdays and Christmas,” she adds. (The gift selection is truly something to behold.) Below, shop the rest of Khloé’s go-to Amazon items while they’re still on sale. Shop All of Khloé’s Amazon FavoritesKitsch Dermaplaning Face Razors Now 20% OffAlyfini Electric Makeup Brush Cleaner Machine Cadence Magnetic Travel Containers Coolife Expandable 5-Piece Luggage Set SAMODRA Bidet AttachmentOMOTON Adjustable Cell Phone StandNow 44% OffOzyalo Luxury Bath Pillows for Tub Neck and Back SupportNow 20% OffUtopia Home Premium Wooden Hangers, 30 PackGREPHONE 4 Pack with 6FT Fast Charging CableUproot Clean Pro Pet Hair Remover Tool Now 33% OffKitchen Gizmo Snap N’ Strain Silicone Clip-On Colander Now 48% OffFineDine Stainless Steel Mixing Bowls, Set of 6 Meg (she/her) is the associate fashion commerce editor at ELLE.com, where she specializes in shopping stories spanning the fashion, home, and lifestyle categories. Over the past three years, she has devoted countless hours to researching brands, testing hundreds (maybe even thousands!) of products, and deep-diving into market and consumer trends. Her favorite job responsibilities consist of co-writing the monthly series Same Same But Different and curating the fashion market for ELLE Escapes. Meg graduated magna cum laude from the Missouri School of Journalism with an emphasis on magazine editing. In 2020, one of her feature stories in the service article category was recognized by the Association for Education in Journalism and Mass Communication. The year prior, the Society of Professional Journalists named voxmagazine.com “Best Affiliated Magazine” in its Mark of Excellence Awards, when she was on staff. Meg’s stories have appeared on Cosmopolitan, Town & Country, Harper’s Bazaar, and Good Housekeeping, among many other outlets. Her personal passions include travel, buffalo sauce, and gardening. You can find her in New York, where she lives, or on Instagram, where she also lives. She will never stop hoping for a One Direction reunion tour.
html:
I’m a shopping expert; I tell people which things are worth buying—it’s my job. But even professionals need advice sometimes, so for Amazon’s Prime Big Deal Days, which runs through today, October 9, I got some advice from none other than Khloé Kardashian. Below, she’s sharing all her favorite Amazon products to shop during the big sale.

“I shop so many things on Amazon,” Kardashian told me via email. “My favorite thing is how wide its selection is. I love to browse through organizing products to see what’s new and looking for beauty products.”

Shop Khloé’s Workout Picks

Zacro Resistance Bands

Now 49% Off

Flybird Weight Bench

Now 31% Off

WHATAFIT Exercise Bands with Door Anchor

Among her picks include a few pieces of gym equipment, in case you’ve set your sights on a revenge body of your own. Kardashian recommends a weight bench and two varieties of resistance bands to upgrade your home gym.

“I love finding new workout equipment on Amazon,” says Kardashian. “I workout almost every day, and it’s important to change up my routine. With resistance bands, there are so many different exercises you can do and keep it exciting.”

Her list also notably features a bidet attachment for toilets, an electric makeup brush cleaner, an affordable luggage set, and a tool that is said to work magic on hard-to-pick-up pet hair. Plus, shoppers with kids can shop from Kardashian’s personal recommendations for parents, including a baby monitor and bassinet.

Shop Khloé’s Baby Essentials

HelloBaby Video Baby Monitor with Camera and Audio, Night Vision

Now 20% Off

YADAQE Baby Basinet Bedside Sleeper

Now 21% Off

Yakry 2-Kids Baby Car Camera for Backseat

“These are products that were important for me when my kids were younger,” she says. “I always got suggestions from my friends and did a lot of research.”

“For Prime Big Deal Days especially, I’m excited to shop for things for upcoming birthdays and Christmas,” she adds. (The gift selection is truly something to behold.)

Below, shop the rest of Khloé’s go-to Amazon items while they’re still on sale.

Shop All of Khloé’s Amazon Favorites

Kitsch Dermaplaning Face Razors

Now 20% Off

Alyfini Electric Makeup Brush Cleaner Machine

Cadence Magnetic Travel Containers

Coolife Expandable 5-Piece Luggage Set

SAMODRA Bidet Attachment

OMOTON Adjustable Cell Phone Stand

Now 44% Off

Ozyalo Luxury Bath Pillows for Tub Neck and Back Support

Now 20% Off

Utopia Home Premium Wooden Hangers, 30 Pack

GREPHONE 4 Pack with 6FT Fast Charging Cable

Uproot Clean Pro Pet Hair Remover Tool

Now 33% Off

Kitchen Gizmo Snap N’ Strain Silicone Clip-On Colander

Now 48% Off

FineDine Stainless Steel Mixing Bowls, Set of 6

Meg (she/her) is the associate fashion commerce editor at ELLE.com, where she specializes in shopping stories spanning the fashion, home, and lifestyle categories. Over the past three years, she has devoted countless hours to researching brands, testing hundreds (maybe even thousands!) of products, and deep-diving into market and consumer trends. Her favorite job responsibilities consist of co-writing the monthly series Same Same But Different and curating the fashion market for ELLE Escapes. Meg graduated magna cum laude from the Missouri School of Journalism with an emphasis on magazine editing. In 2020, one of her feature stories in the service article category was recognized by the Association for Education in Journalism and Mass Communication. The year prior, the Society of Professional Journalists named voxmagazine.com “Best Affiliated Magazine” in its Mark of Excellence Awards, when she was on staff. Meg’s stories have appeared on Cosmopolitan, Town & Country, Harper’s Bazaar, and Good Housekeeping, among many other outlets. Her personal passions include travel, buffalo sauce, and gardening. You can find her in New York, where she lives, or on Instagram, where she also lives. She will never stop hoping for a One Direction reunion tour.
